option.value: {"/Users/ahnhyeongjun/Goorm/Database/postgreConnectPractice":"{\"/src/test/java/com/example/postgreconnectpractice/PostgreConnectPracticeApplicationTests.java\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. It is a test class for the `PostgreConnectPracticeApplication` class, which is likely the main application class for a Spring Boot application that interacts with a PostgreSQL database. The `@SpringBootTest` annotation is used to load the entire Spring application context and run the tests within it.\\n\\nThe `contextLoads()` method is a simple test method that checks if the Spring application context can be loaded successfully. This is a common starting point for testing a Spring Boot application.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/postgreconnectpractice/entity/UserRepository.java\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. It defines an interface `UserRepository` that extends the `JpaRepository` interface provided by Spring Data JPA. This interface is used to interact with a database table representing the `User` entity, allowing for basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on the `User` entities.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/postgreconnectpractice/controller/UserController.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot controller class that handles user-related operations.\\n\\n`UserController`: This class is a REST controller that provides endpoints for managing users.\\n\\n`getAllUsers()`: This function retrieves a list of all users from the database.\\n\\n`createUser(User user)`: This function creates a new user in the database based on the provided user data.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/postgreconnectpractice/entity/User.java\":\"This file defines a single class, `User`, which represents a user entity in a PostgreSQL database.\\n\\n`User`: A class that represents a user entity in a PostgreSQL database, with properties for the user\\u0027s ID, name, and email.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, but rather defines the structure of the `User` entity using the Lombok library for generating boilerplate code.\",\"/src/main/java/com/example/postgreconnectpractice/PostgreConnectPracticeApplication.java\":\"This file is the main class of a Spring Boot application that connects to a PostgreSQL database. It does not contain any additional classes or functions, but rather serves as the entry point for the application.\\n\\n`PostgreConnectPracticeApplication`: This is the main class of the Spring Boot application, which is responsible for bootstrapping the application and starting the Spring context.\\n\\n`main`: This is the main method of the `PostgreConnectPracticeApplication` class, which is the entry point for the application. It calls the `SpringApplication.run()` method to start the Spring Boot application.\"}"}
